text: The Buena Creek station is a Sprinter light rail station. It is served by North County Transit District. Although the address is in Vista, it is actually just in a unincorporated area of San Diego County. == Platforms and tracks == Westbound station Station Station Station Eastbound station Civic Center-Vista (toward Oceanside Transit Center) Buena Creek Palomar College (toward Escondido Transit Center) ← → == Other websites == *Map of the station on Google Maps Category:North County Transit District stations Category:2008 establishments in California
title: Buena Creek (NCTD station)
